```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
conflicts_india_2001 <- read_csv('relevant_data.csv')
```
```{r}

total_deaths_india_2001 <- conflicts_india_2001 %>%
  summarize(total_deaths_best = sum(best),
            total_deaths_low = sum(low),
            total_deaths_high = sum(high))
```
